content.description: Begin a few feet left of EZ Chimney.  Move straight up the face passing the roof on the right.  Continue straight up.
content.protection: Standard Blue Mounds top rope setup. Long webbing lets you use a large tree.
content.location: The face just left of EZ Chimney.

content.description: Stinger begins just left of an eight foot sapling near the taller right hand side of Wasp Haven Buttress' wall.  Move straight up the lower slab to a short roof that runs across the right half of the face.  Pull the roof using a good flat edge and a selection of testy sidepulls.  Continue up either bailing left for easier terrain or traverse right then up to the highest point of the buttress (recommended).  A little contrived but worth doing if you're in the area.
content.protection: Standard Blue Mounds toprope (long slings helpful)
content.location: Start just left of the eight foot sapling growing near the bottom of the tallest, right hand side of the cliff (close to Sun Drop II Tower).

content.description: The short wide chimney with a chockstone in the top half. Crux is getting off the ground.
content.protection: Unlikely you will need or want gear for this climb. If you are worried bring your biggest hex and a long runner.

content.description: Through the right side of overhang, start is crimps to a decent gaston work up to a flake and pull last couple moves.
content.protection: Cord couple cams and nuts for Toprope ancore

content.description: A short wall with a couple easy routes and some harder stuff.  Wasp Haven Buttress is the face immediately behind Sun Drop II Tower.
